about_the_game:
Explore dimensions that no soul has ever traveled

Fly weightlessly through mesmerizing 3D landscapes and discover an endless variety of fractal worlds. (Gamepad controls highly recommended)


Gather energy as you fly by

Fill up your resources in fly-by without interrupting your flow and manage your energy in an intuitive, easy to use management system.

Fight to transform the darkness back into light

Defeat the darkness with simple yet challenging combat and auto-aim for constant flow state. Flying units protect the enemy bases by searching for the player and attacking directly.


Develop your character

With each level-up you customize your character in five complementary systems - booster, ammo, armor, sensors, weapon upgrades.
Diversify or specialize – every run is different and you can never have it all.

Faithful companion

Enjoy the help and company of your robotic companion. Nixie has its own upgrades and progression and carries a flashlight and a protective shockwave.


Minimalistic UI Design

All UI elements are designed to be intuitive and easy to use. Texts are displayed with a delay to avoid disturbing the flow state.


The game is designed for a flow state experience. The abstract but organic aesthetic of the 3D fractals has a profoundly relaxing effect on the brain as its pattern recognition algorithm is suspended. The effect is comparable to looking at clouds as well as listening to whale songs or white noise to calm down.






About us


"INU - A Glimpse of Infinity" is being developed by RobotHeart Lab in Leipzig, Germany. The game is the creation of only one developer with true passion for fractals and new ways to play.

RobotHeart Lab is an indie studio developing mind-expanding software and games. We want to combine games and fractals so that players can experience emotions, stories, and adventures in infinite virtual worlds not designed by humans, but only recently discovered by them.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows (7, 8 and 10), 64-bit system required
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.4 GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 or comparable
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows (7, 8 and 10), 64-bit system required
  • Processor: Intel i7 3.8 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or comparable

short_description: INU is an atmospheric exploration adventure in an infinite 3D fractal universe. “Journey” meets “No Man’s Sky” in truly infinite, mesmerizing alien landscapes – not created more like discovered.
